description.narrative: (i) Increase the availability of modern and environmentally friendly business infrastructure in strategic locations with rising demand across the country; (ii) Expand the offering of office space to include co-working space that is expected to enhance business performance; (iii)Increase payments to the Government of Romania; (iv) Increase demand for upstream industries such as cement and steel sectors and downstream industries such as IT&C, business process outsourcing and retail sectors, given that these are the current prominent pillars of the office and logistic sectors in Romania; and (v) Enhance the private sectors resilience by providing alternative source for long-term financing by diversifying the investor base in Romanias still-emerging bond market.

The investment consists of a 50 million participation in a 7-year senior unsecured Eurobond issue launched by Globalworth Real Estate Investments Ltd (GREIL or the Company) under its 1.5 billion Euro Medium Term Notes program. The notes issued under the program are listed on the Irish Stock Exchange and an application will be made for a secondary listing on the Bucharest Stock Exchange. GREIL is an integrated commercial property developer and manager in Romania and Poland. The Company focuses on Class A office space, premium logistics/light-industrial properties in the CEE region, either standing or through low-risk developments.

mailing-address.narrative: Globalworth Real Estate Investments Ltd Stan Andre Deputy CIO +40 372 800 000 Stan.Andre@globalworth.com Globalworth Tower, 26th floor, 201 Barbu Vacarescu Boulevard, 2nd district, 020276, Bucharest, Romania www.globalworth.com
